description: Fixed .julieignore auto-generation bug: Vendor directories like target/, node_modules/, build/ are now detected and added to .julieignore even though they're in the hardcoded blacklist. Two fixes: (1) Pass empty HashSet instead of blacklisted_dirs during initial vendor scan so all directories are analyzed, (2) Expanded vendor directory pattern matching to include target, node_modules, build, dist, out, bin, obj, Debug, Release, packages, bower_components. Updated 2 test fixtures from build/ to compiled/ to avoid false positives. Test test_discover_indexable_files_creates_julieignore_for_blacklisted_vendor_dirs now passes.
